scripts.morphdom-rm-export: sed -i'.bak' -e "s/export default morphdom;/self.morphdom=morphdom;/g" priv/static/assets/js/morphdom-esm.js && rm -f priv/static/assets/js/morphdom-esm.js.bak
scripts.build: npm run morphdom-cp && npm run morphdom-rm-export && npm run morphdom-wrap && npm run morphdom-uglify && npm run morphdom-clean
scripts.prettier: prettier priv/static/assets/js/arizona*.js --write && prettier test/*.js --write  && prettier eslint.config.mjs --write && prettier package.json --write && prettier .prettierrc --write
scripts.eslint: eslint priv/static/assets/js/arizona*.js && eslint test/test.js && eslint eslint.config.mjs
scripts.format-lint: npm install && npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.ci: npm run format-lint && npm run test
